title: Search Ad Performance Measures
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Ad Performance Peformance Measures. They should be included as and when rollup is performed from lowest granular object (ads/keywords) to top level objects - example campaign, adgroup.

xdm:clicks.description: Total number of clicks on your ads or keywords.

xdm:impressions.description: Total number of impressions on your ads or keywords.

xdm:totalCost.description: Total Spend on your ads or keywords.

xdm:avgPosition.description: Average Position of the Ad displayed on Search Engine.

xdm:topPageBid.description: Top of the Page Bid Estimator.

xdm:qualityScore.description: Quality Score of the Keyword assigned by the network - range 1 to 10.
